statements: SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM Products;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products GROUP BY category;
SELECT category, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM Products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Products GROUP BY category HAVING avg_price > 50;
SELECT category, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM Products GROUP BY category HAVING total_price > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Toys');
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < (SELECT AVG(price) FROM Products);
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM Products);
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products WHERE category LIKE '%Clothing%' GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT order_date, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY order_date;
SELECT products.product_name, SUM(orders.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name IN ('Product1', 'Product2');
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM products);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers RIGHT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 100;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id AND orders.total_amount > 100;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id OR orders.total_amount > 100;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;
SELECT customers.name, SUM(orders.total_amount) AS total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS order_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS order_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT customers.name, AVG(orders.total_amount) AS avg_total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;

SELECT customers.name, MIN(orders.total_amount) AS min_total_amount, MAX(orders.total_amount) AS max_total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, products.name AS product_name, products.price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.total_amount > products.price;

SELECT product_name, price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;

SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT MAX(total_amount) as max_amount FROM orders;
SELECT MIN(price) as min_price FROM products;
